Mine ChatGPT for pdf metadata: Title, Year, and Journal.

ll_extract_journals.Rd

Mine ChatGPT for pdf metadata: Title, Year, and Journal.

Usage

ll_extract_journals(
  file_path,
  model = "gpt-4o-mini",
  api_key = Sys.getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY"),
  clean_journals = TRUE
)

Arguments

file_path

string, A single pdf file or directory containing pdfs.

model

string, which OpenAI ChatGPT model to use.

api_key

string, the API key if you want to supply it manually. There is no free one, but used with a minimal model is very cheap. https://openai.com/api/pricing/.

clean_journals

logical, whether to output a cleaned dataframe of journals. If FALSE, returns raw ChatGPT output. This can be useful in case ChatGPT goes off script and hallucinates.

Value

a dataframe.

On this page
